feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r MoviesApp(MoviesApp) :m GUI(GUI) :g [1,1] : Thin(Thin) : Rich(Rich) :m DB(DB) :g [1,1] : Local(Local) : Remote(Remote) :m CachePolicy(CachePolicy) :m Network(Network) :g [1,1] : Wifi(Wifi) : Bluetooth(Bluetooth) :o GPS(GPS) :o Built_In(Built_In)
